amendment.description: Amendment repeals existing restrictions on the United States from transferring and exporting weapons, and defense articles and services to the Republic of Cyprus.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 27 printed in Part B of House Report 116-143 to repeal existing restrictions on the United States from transferring and exporting weapons, and defense articles and services to the Republic of Cyprus.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cicilline amendment (A019) Agreed to by recorded vote: 252 - 173 (Roll no. 451).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cicilline amendment (A019) Agreed to by recorded vote: 252 - 173 (Roll no. 451).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Cicilline.
